> No one has ever died wearing me. 
# It's true. She leaves the unworthy before they fall.

2887970516.name: Kellslayer's Greaves
2887970516.description: All that remains are broken bodies and the lingering hint of dissipated ether.

2888350168.name: Gatewatch

2888350169.description: The gauntlet, vambrace, and joints of a Titan's arms must withstand colossal forces.

2898679054.name: Justicar's Boots
2898679054.description: Our choice is simple: find our strength, or face extinction.

2898679055.name: Order's Boots
2898679055.description: Our choice is simple: find our strength, or face extinction.

2898884241.description: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

2898884243.name: Iron Regalia Hood
2898884243.description: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

2899003088.name: "Existential Threats"
2899003088.description: Furious debate divides those that seek knowledge in order to aid the City, and those who seek knowledge for its own sake.

2899003089.name: "Blind Evoke"
2899003089.description: "Learning without application is like drinking without thirst." - from Aphorisms To Anger Warlocks, a Hunter handbook

2899003096.description: A Warlock's bond signifies control over the Traveler's Light. What 'control' means is a matter of debate.

2899003097.description: A Warlock's Bond is both a symbol and a focus of power. Your Ghost jury-rigged this simple example.

2899003098.description: A bond is symbol, instrument, and warning. Light can reveal mysteries. But even a child knows not to stare into the sun.

2899003099.name: Bond of Will
2899003099.description: "Consider the word: bond. Remember, as you wield this power, that you are not alone." - Pujari, The Transcripts

2899003100.name: Bond of Polarity
2899003100.description: Some orders believe that Light and Darkness exist beyond the merely material, with a logic of their own.

2899003101.name: Bond of the Universal
2899003101.description: Some orders argue that Light and Darkness can be explained in the context of supersymmetric physics.

2899003102.name: "The Calming"
2899003102.description: "I have devised a technique to liberate the soul from the flesh. It works very reliably on Fallen."

2899003103.name: Bond of Unknowing
2899003103.description: Some orders assert that Light and Darkness are not bound by any system of reason or causality.

2900708616.name: Takanome Ranger's Hood

2900708617.name: Ayane Takanome's Cloak

2900708618.name: Pilgrim's Cloak
2900708618.description: How many fell on the road to the City? How few made the last leg of the journey with a Ghost over their shoulders?

2900708619.name: Cloak of Keen Eyes
2900708619.description: "My ancestors were born beyond the Walls, on the long march to the City."

2902070748.name: Iron Regalia Boots
2902070748.description: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

2902070749.name: Legs of the Seven
2902070749.description: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

2903199470.name: Nanomania Grasps
2903199470.description: Let's get right to it. How can Clovis Bray help the Exodus project? ~SIVA.MEM.CL001

2903199471.name: Spliced Nanomania Grasps
2903199471.description: Let's get right to it. How can Clovis Bray help the Exodus project? ~SIVA.MEM.CL001

2917379817.description: Hunters suffer insomnia at far higher rates than other Guardians—even Exos.

2927156752.name: Claws of Ahamkara
2927156752.description: Look at all this life, oh bearer mine. There is so much left to burn...

2927739791.description: Made from the torn cloaks of other Hunters. Other, lesser Hunters.

2928398154.name: Spektar Helmet
2928398154.description: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

2928398155.description: "The Awoken numbers are fewer now. But our will to fight remains undiminished." —Petra Venj

2935267644.name: Queen's Guard Greaves
2935267644.description: Carry yourself lightly, and with pride.

2936370154.name: Born Spark

3300523568.name: Queen's Guard Boots

3316745441.description: Most Hunters favor a light plate cuirass over the field wire underweave.

3325871682.name: Speeder's Scarf
3325871682.description:
Two bright ribbons of triumph receding into the distance..

This item can be discarded and reclaimed at the holiday kiosk.

3335833364.name: Nightstalker's Cloak
3335833364.description: "We are the rangers, the keen-eyed scouts who stalk the Darkness where it dwells."

3335833365.name: Cloak of the Sixth Reign
3335833365.description: One throne beneath the howling dark.

3335833366.name: Gunslinger's Cloak
3335833366.description: In the dark days before the Last City, all a Hunter had was the Light and a steady aim.

3335833367.name: Bladedancer's Cloak
3335833367.description: "These blades…they're an extension of your arm, your reflexes, your Light."

3338086100.name: Exodus Grips
3338086100.description: We must make our own safety without the City.

3338086101.name: Fatekiller Grips
3338086101.description: We must make our own safety without the City.

3342123014.name: Days of Iron Steps

3342415802.name: Winged Sun Sleeves
3342415802.description: "Those who fly beneath the Sun do not come back unscathed." —Parables of the Allspring

3342415803.name: Blindsight Sleeves
3342415803.description: "With the sight, I saw the self within the self." —Fractal Scrolls

3346519202.name: Bond of the Universal

3346519203.name: Bond of Polarity

3346783228.name: Cloak of the Sixth Reign
3346783228.description: One throne beneath the howling dark.

3348229560.name: Cover of the Exile
3348229560.description: "Don't you find it strange that the one called The Speaker rarely has anything useful to say?" —Sayings of the Disciples

3349269944.name: Axiom Coven V
3349269944.description: The sleek housing conceals filigreed waveguides, ready to slip through the scalp and interface with the brain.

3356538611.description: "Show me all that I have yet to rule."

3359564868.name: "Dispersed Vengeance"
3359564868.description: "I made quite a reputation in the Crucible. Spent some time trying to outrun it." - Ikora Rey

3359564870.name: "After Effects"
3359564870.description: "Nothing that happens in the Crucible is irreversible…except the lessons you learn."

3359564871.name: "The Gone"
3359564871.description: "He came at me with a knife. I put out my hand and - just so - made him into ash."

3366017012.name: "Loop of Night"
3366017012.description: "I could flense you apart, molecule by squirming molecule. It is within my power." - Toland the Shattered

3366017013.name: "Eternal Light"
3366017013.description: "You stand for something immutable and transcendent. Act like it." - reprimand to a younger Ikora Rey

3366017015.name: "Twist of Fate"
3366017015.description: "There will come a time when you can no longer see objects - only clouds of probability and law."

3367372899.name: Days of Iron Gauntlets
3367372899.description: "When the tainted grail o'erflowed again, who answered?" —The New-Forged Song

3367833896.name: Kabr's Wrath
3367833896.description: In the aftermath, he became obsessed with the machines.

3367833897.name: Kabr's Might
3367833897.description: In the aftermath, he became obsessed with the machines.

3370271341.description: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

3380876004.name: Competitive Shell

3382423372.name: Heliopause Grips

3382423373.name: Dead Light Grips

3382423374.name: Exodus Grips

3382423375.name: Sojourn Grips

3383355341.name: Exodus Cover
3383355341.description: Travel the wilderness and master it. This is our salvation.

3385520597.description: Enough talk. The time has come for action.

3387472393.description: "Strengthen the body, empower the mind." —Parables of the Allspring

3394456883.description: "The Hunter creed calls us outward. And what do we find out there? Hard vacuum. Respect it."

3399822332.name: Iron Companion Sleeves

3411635687.name: Viper Spine VI

3471211333.description: Our choice is simple: find our strength, or face extinction.

3471865172.description: "The Dreadnaught is a blighted hollow gouged into our Universe." —Eris Morn

3471865173.name: Harrowed Darkhollow Mask
3471865173.description: "The Dreadnaught is a blighted hollow gouged into our universe." —Eris Morn

3472912587.name: Iron Camelot Gloves
3472912587.description: Forged in remembrance of Timur, he whom the City's enemies dreaded most.

3473700532.name: "The Chaos Constant"
3473700532.description: "Darkness consumes, but, we shall mark the abyss with eternal fire."

3473700533.name: "No Tomorrow"
3473700533.description: "For every dead yesterday there waits a new dawn, with no promise of tomorrow."

3473700535.name: "Circle of War"
3473700535.description: "Understanding is not an end, but a beginning from which new truths are born."

3477470986.name: Iron Regalia Vest
3477470986.description: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

3481422576.name: Apex Harmonic
3481422576.description: If disconnected, each half of the brain can express its own personality and thoughts. Sometimes this is useful.

3481422577.name: Unity Clade
3481422577.description: "It can be difficult to lead Hunters. I suggest you hint you're from a future where they've all died."

3481539764.name: Mark of Renown
3481539764.description: Robust and flexible, the iconic Fieldplate pattern has served every Titan order.

3481539765.name: Mark of Diligence
3481539765.description: Titan armor is crafted by legion members, not the City's foundries. Every would-be smith proves themselves on Fieldplate.

3481539766.name: Mark of Fortitude
3481539766.description: Some historians mark the rise of Fieldplate as the moment the Titan orders found their footing.

3500664182.name: Harrowed Darkhollow Grasps
3500664182.description: "All the vastness of our universe is but a blank page on which they scrawl their words of hate and death." —Eris Morn

3500666776.name: Iron Companion Legs
3500666776.description: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

3501164583.name: Queen's Guard Boots
3501164583.description: Carry yourself lightly, and with pride.

3502255781.name: Lantern Greaves
3502255781.description: "We walked to the end of the world and beyond." —Zavala

3505154500.name: Fatekiller Boots
3505154500.description: It will be cold and harrowing and we will not all survive. But it must be done.

3505154501.name: Exodus Boots
3505154501.description: It will be cold and harrowing and we will not all survive. But it must be done.

3507021085.name: Oryx Mask
3507021085.description:
I am the Taken King!

This mask can be discarded and reclaimed at the holiday kiosk.

3508095748.name: Order's Boots
3508095748.description: At the end of war, we shall walk in triumph among the stars.

3508095749.name: Justicar's Boots
3508095749.description: Our choice is simple: find our strength, or face extinction.

3508095750.name: Kallipolis Boots
3508095750.description: A City is only as strong as its leader.

3508095751.name: Elector's Boots
3508095751.description: Our footfalls forge the path to a new age.

3515978626.name: Blindsight Gloves
3515978626.description: "With the sight I saw the self within the self." —Fractal Scrolls

3515978627.name: Winged Sun Gloves
3515978627.description: "Those who fly beneath the Sun do not come back unscathed." —Parables of the Allspring

3523581236.name: Carnivore Match
3523581236.description: Artificial myofibers regulate respiration and heartbeat—or pump coolant for Exo users.

3523581237.name: Sanction Custom
3523581237.description: Trends develop in the ecosystem of custom armor. Crucible gear runs hot and burns out fast.

3529294924.name: Spliced Cosmoclast Mark
3529294924.description: The Exodus program would be interested in exploring SIVA's defensive applications. ~SIVA.MEM.CL013

3529294925.name: Cosmoclast Mark
3529294925.description: The Exodus program would be interested in exploring SIVA's defensive applications. ~SIVA.MEM.CL013

3530998732.name: Snakeline 4.5
3530998732.description: As Hunters grow more experienced, they begin rewiring their armor inspired by Light.

3530998733.name: Snakeline 4.5.2
3530998733.description: As Hunters grow more experienced, they begin rewiring their armor inspired by Light.

3532502999.name: SIVA Mask
3532502999.description:
~replicate enhance consume candy~

This mask can be discarded and reclaimed at the holiday kiosk.

3534727768.name: Kabr's Brazen Grips
3534727768.description: He consumed their technology like fire. Fashioning armor from their remnants.

3535605648.name: Mark of the Sentry
3535605648.description: The City's enemies often use airmobile tactics. Some Titans train for rapid response to these landings.

3535605649.name: Mark of the First Pillar
3535605649.description: Titans train to fight on dangerous ground, a first line of defense against any crisis.

3535605650.name: Mark of the Anchor
3535605650.description: Titan orders are often accused of dour fatalism. But there are those who celebrate all they protect.

3535605651.name: Mark of the Fortress
3535605651.description: Fortresses do not wait silently for war. They are schools, trading posts, monuments. Vessels for life.

3535605652.name: Mark of the Beacon
3535605652.description: "A singer came to me, saying, 'You protect me, and I do nothing in return.' I told him to sing, and he understood." - Saint-14

3535605653.name: Mark of Fury
3535605653.description: "We can wait here until the Traveler falls! Or we can go out there and kill them!" - from a doctrinal dispute

3535605654.name: Mark of the Martyred
3535605654.description: It is called the Firebreak Calculus: how much good could I do if I find the right place and fight until I die?

3535605655.name: Mark of Lost Charge
3535605655.description: A zealous few sneer at the legend of Six Fronts. Our invincible defense was a waste, they say. We should have charged.

3535605656.name: Mark of the Lost
3535605656.description: Every Titan's individual legend could inspire a new lineage of marks.

3535605657.name: Mark of the Keeper
3535605657.description: When there is turmoil in the City, cool-headed Titans often help restore the peace. Sometimes it costs them.

3542328989.name: Ghost Mask
3542328989.description:
"You look particularly dashing today. New haircut?" —Ghost

This mask can be discarded and reclaimed at the holiday kiosk.

3542867423.name: Kingslayer Shell
3542867423.description: For Ghosts who were there when Oryx fell.

3544127854.name: Prototype 0.9b
3544127854.description: Your Ghost built this wire armor from available mass. It handles life support, but little else.

3548768183.name: Stellar Impact Gauntlets
3548768183.description: Welcome to Mark 2 STELLAR IMPACT. Optimized for concussive orbital reentry.

3549968172.name: Deathsinger's Herald
3549968172.description: "Frankly, it's surprising that these don't hover."

3550220456.name: Tengu Operant VI
3550220456.description: The vestments of an old gnostic order, sworn to search for an absolute that exists beyond symbols.

3550220457.name: Tengu Operant IX
3550220457.description: The vestments of an old gnostic order, sworn to search for an absolute that exists beyond symbols.

3550220458.name: Tengu Operant
3550220458.description: The vestments of an old gnostic order, sworn to search for an absolute that exists beyond symbols.

3550220459.name: Tengu Operant II
3550220459.description: The vestments of an old gnostic order, sworn to search for an absolute that exists beyond symbols.

3552383232.name: Mark of Oblivion
3552383232.description: Our salvation lies ahead of us. Go forth. There is nothing left to leave behind.

3552383234.name: Mark of the Sojourn
3552383234.description: Our will is such that we find strength in the gaze of Death itself.

3552383235.name: Mark of Unity
3552383235.description: The Six Fronts, perhaps the most recognizable element used in Titan marks, memorializes a mighty stand.

3552383236.name: Jolder's Iron Sash
3552383236.description: You are an army, an armada, a force unto itself.

3552383237.name: Mark of the Circle
3552383237.description: History's lords have ever painted the future in tones of fire and shadow.

3552383238.name: Mark of Chaos
3552383238.description: There is no doubt that our future will be won in battle.

3552383239.name: Mark of No Tomorrow
3552383239.description: Passion and patience in equal measure will open the unlimited way.

3552383242.name: Mark of the Rising
3552383242.description: What rules us is our service to the greater welfare of the City.

3552383243.name: Radegast's Iron Sash
3552383243.description: Stand in the fire until there is nothing left to burn away.

3560158448.name: Seraph Reform I
3560158448.description: "Maybe we were someplace good, you know. And then the Ghosts took us away."

3560158449.name: Seraph Reform II
3560158449.description: "Maybe we were someplace good, you know. And then the Ghosts took us away."

3560158450.name: Seraph I
3560158450.description: "Maybe we were someplace good, you know. And then the Ghosts took us away."

3560158451.name: Seraph II
3560158451.description: "Maybe we were someplace good, you know. And then the Ghosts took us away."

3560158454.name: Cormorant Line I
3560158454.description: Those of the Cormorant Seal must prove themselves willing to give their lives to others.

3560158455.name: Cormorant Line II
3560158455.description: Those of the Cormorant Seal must prove themselves willing to give their lives to others.

3563367176.name: Crystalline Boots
3563367176.description: "The Warlocks strewed dancing lights in our way, and we forgot our aches and chills." —Eva Levante

3566391144.name: Justicar's Gloves
3566391144.description: A finger can be broken. A fist cannot.

3566391145.name: Order's Gloves
3566391145.description: Before conquering the stars, one must first hold the home planet.

3566391146.name: Elector's Gloves
3566391146.description: True power comes from the hands of the people.

3566391147.name: Kallipolis Gloves
3566391147.description: We cannot win the war beyond our walls without first winning the people within them.

3566605996.name: "Curse of the Hidden"
3566605996.description: "I vowed to avenge them all, and this curse I will carry to my final death." - Eriana-3

3566605998.name: "Emerald Light"
3566605998.description: "They'll believe you are one of their own. And that is the only way." - Toland, the Shattered

3566605999.name: "Song of Dusk"
3566605999.description: "I'll be the last Light they ever see." - Eriana-3

3569611578.name: Ghost Ghost
3569611578.description: For Ghosts who prefer to go in disguise.

3572302284.name: Neuroghast 2.1
3572302284.description: Cytogel veins improve reflexes and senses while also heightening pain feedback for sharper awareness.

3572302285.name: Neuroghast 1.0
3572302285.description: Cytogel veins improve reflexes and senses while also heightening pain feedback for sharper awareness.

3574778420.name: Purifier Robes
3574778420.description: "Fire is the breaking of bonds. Fire is freedom. We must be swift and thorough in our liberation."

3574778421.name: Starfire Protocol
3574778421.description: 13.4 billion years ago, the first stars kindled out of darkness, seeding the future of all life.

3574778422.name: Voidfang Vestments
3574778422.description: "YOU WILL DREAM OF TEETH AND NOTHING ELSE" —scratched behind a buckle

3574778423.name: Heart of the Praxic Fire
3574778423.description: "In that last moment she seemed as wholly luminescent as the Sun, and I wished to be so brave."

3575059040.name: Greaves of No Tomorrow
3575059040.description: When the last war comes, we will be the victors.

3575059041.name: Astrolord Greaves
3575059041.description: When the last war comes, we will be the victors.

3585938528.name: Mark of the Protector
3585938528.description: The first Titans led survivors to the safety of the City.

3585938529.name: Mark of the Bulwarks
3585938529.description: "War upon stone and it grows weaker. War upon man and he grows stronger. Which shall your wall be built of?"

3585938536.name: Mark of the Chain
3585938536.description: Even at Six Fronts, the City's darkest hour, some Titans broke orders, but the Chain prevailed.

3585938537.name: Mark of Command
3585938537.description: "A successful defense prolongs a war. A successful attack ends it."

3585938538.name: Mark of the Chosen
3585938538.description: "Your Light drives your armor. Do not speak of yourself as separate from the plate." - Pujari, Transcript XV

3585938539.name: Mark of the New Front
3585938539.description: The Firebreak orders strive to draw the battle away from the City and its interests.

3585938540.name: Mark of Resolve
3585938540.description: "You cannot control the enemy. You can control yourself. The real victory lies within." - Pujari, Transcript VII

3585938541.name: Mark of the Watcher
3585938541.description: "The mark's just pretty cloth. What matters is what it stands for." - Pujari, Transcript IX

3585938542.name: Mark of the Six Fronts
3585938542.description: Four orders of Titans held six approaches in the first great battle around the Last City, and not one front broke.

3585938543.name: Mark of the Pilgrim Guard
3585938543.description: Legend holds that Titans stood in defense of the first pilgrims to gather below the Traveler.

3592133162.name: On the Marsh
3592133162.description: Swamp camouflage is the hottest fashion these days.

3592133163.name: End Unsung
3592133163.description: A humble cloak worn in tribute to the Guardians who met their end alone in the wild.

3593684385.name: Days of Iron Grips
3593684385.description: "When the tainted grail o'erflowed again, who answered?" —The New-Forged Song

3595608716.name: Komarov 3.1
3595608716.description: Never lose your bearings. A disoriented Hunter cannot select vital targets or track lines of flight.

3595608717.name: Komarov 3.1.2
3595608717.description: Never lose your bearings. A disoriented Hunter cannot select vital targets or track lines of flight.

3595608718.name: Komarov 3.1.3
3595608718.description: Never lose your bearings. A disoriented Hunter cannot select vital targets or track lines of flight.

3595608719.name: Komarov 3.1r4
3595608719.description: Never lose your bearings. A disoriented Hunter cannot select vital targets or track lines of flight.

3597491335.name: Crystalline Robes
3597491335.description: "There was a before. There was warmth and light in the midst of the cold. That is the Dawning."  —Ikora Rey

3598383276.name: Duskrender Type 0
3598383276.description: He never sought glory or prizes. Only peace.

3598383277.name: Murvaux Type 0
3598383277.description: "Luke Romagne. Gave his last full measure in the European Dead Zone." —The Last Stands of First Pillars

3598716818.name: Bond of the Queen's Guard
3598716818.description: One throne beneath the howling dark.

3600920071.name: Snow Angel Boots
3600920071.description: "Sure, it was cold. But I'm an Exo. We keep going." —Cayde-6

3602716116.name: Mark of the Exile
3602716116.description: "Though the City won a great battle at Twilight Gap, it lost an even greater mind." —Sister Lupe

3602716120.name: Dead Light Mark
3602716120.description: "Beyond the City. Yes, beyond the Traveler." —Arach Jalaal

3602716121.name: Immanent War Mark
3602716121.description: The subtlest of wars still leave their marks.

3602716122.name: Silimar's Iron Sash
3602716122.description: Ward or fist, you cannot be broken.

3602716123.name: Mark of the Initiative
3602716123.description: Speak with the voice of the people, or prepare to face them.

3602716124.name: Golden Hour Mark
3602716124.description: I wear this in service. I earned this by sacrifice.

3602716125.name: Lightning Mark
3602716125.description: "The sun low in the sky, the wind in your hair, your enemies piled at your feet. Perfection."

3602716127.name: Mark of Contention
3602716127.description: The mighty Thalor was invincible in the Crucible - until Dredgen Yor, and his Thorn.

3606232300.name: Consumed Shell
3606232300.description: For Ghosts who have found a new shape.

3607447067.name: Heliopause Helm
3607447067.description: If only Darkness lies beyond the heliopause, we have already lost.

3612644688.name: Eon Tracer Mark
3612644688.description: "We trace the history of war throughout the ages." —Lakshmi-2

3615941478.name: Exodus Grips
3615941478.description: We must make our own safety without the City.

3615941479.name: Sojourn Grips
3615941479.description: We must make our own safety without the City.

3619493706.name: Formation Mark
3619493706.description: Crucible tactics explore the tension between team cohesion and individual bravura.

3619493707.name: Mark of Favor
3619493707.description: City communities work together to produce these marks as gifts for their champions.

3619493708.name: Mark of the Dauntless
3619493708.description: "Yes, we've achieved the objective. And the next. And the…were we supposed to stop attacking?" —Wei Ning

3619493709.name: Holborn's Host Mark
3619493709.description: Genial old Holborn led a group of Guardians on several risky expeditions to Mars.

3619493710.name: Mark of the Wolves
3619493710.description: "I am the leader of the pack."

3619862808.name: Mark of the Risen
3619862808.description: A Titan's mark declares deeds and influences. Your Ghost scrounged this cloth together. It's a start.

3620910776.name: Kellbreaker's Mind
3620910776.description: The death of a Kell avenges more than blood. The untold xenottabytes of data lost to their scavenging is deserving of retribution as well.

3632113863.name: Immanent War Boots
3632113863.description: Tear through chaos. Leave it in ash.

3633902467.name: Iron Saga Plate
3633902467.description: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

3636271392.name: Mark of the Exile
3636271392.description: A prestigious trophy earned in battle during the Trials of Osiris.

3636271393.name: Watchers' Mark
3636271393.description: A prestigious trophy earned in battle during the Trials of Osiris.

3636271394.name: Mark of the Order
3636271394.description: The City prospers on our field of order and justice.

3636271395.name: Mark of the Executor
3636271395.description: The New Monarchy is the aegis that guards humanity.

3636271396.name: Mark of the Supreme
3636271396.description: Titan lore memorializes the greatest warriors of humanity's past.

3636271397.name: Mark of the Conqueror
3636271397.description: "THE LAST AND SUREST ARGUMENT" - traditional inscription for the right gauntlet, attributed to Wei Ning

3636271398.name: NOYB Mark
3636271398.description: "One day in the Crucible tells you everything you need to know about a Guardian. Even yourself." - Thalor

3636271399.name: "Cast in Blood"
3636271399.description: "The naysayers in Consensus don't understand that we LIKE to fight each other." - Ain Suhu-ässä

3636271402.name: Avenger Mark
3636271402.description: "I require no miracles. We will reclaim our worlds with systematic, aggressive action against enemy assets. "

3636271403.name: Mark of the Stoneborn
3636271403.description: "They don't fail." - Commander Zavala, in an emergency session of the City Consensus

3637940698.name: Watchers' Boots
3637940698.description: "Light burns. Light heals. Light blinds. Light reveals." —Parables of the Allspring

3637940699.name: Boots of the Exile
3637940699.description: "Many followed him when he left—if not with their feet, then with their hearts." —Fractal Scrolls

3641510344.name: Stratus 3.1
3641510344.description: Descended from an aerospace design, the optics and sensorium provide excellent awareness.

3641510345.name: Stratus 3.1.2
3641510345.description: Descended from an aerospace design, the optics and sensorium provide excellent awareness.

3641510346.name: Stratus 3.1.3
3641510346.description: Descended from an aerospace design, the optics and sensorium provide excellent awareness.

3641510347.name: Stratus 3.1r4
3641510347.description: Descended from an aerospace design, the optics and sensorium provide excellent awareness.

3643876249.name: Endling Grasps
3643876249.description: We cannot let the lineage end with us.

3653048976.name: "Blood and Mortar"
3653048976.description: "A distraction? The Crucible challenges our best. It is the finest training the City could ask."

3653048977.name: "Atlas's Burden"
3653048977.description: "Other ages had the phalanx, the carrier, the KKV. Now you are the defining weapons system of our time."

3653048978.name: Mark of the Spawn
3653048978.description: "It's not an Acolyte's loin cloth, it's the spoils of war." - Vell Tarlowe

3653048979.name: "Ultimateless"
3653048979.description: Those who bear this mark vow to always test the limits of Light against the Light itself.

3653048980.name: Mark of the War Tides
3653048980.description: "At the doom of Men he will return home among the wise Vanir." - the Edda

3653048982.name: "The Mandate"
3653048982.description: "We reject this cumbersome doctrine of interdependence. Every solitary Titan must be a standfast against the dark."

3653048983.name: Mark of Fortune
3653048983.description: "I would trust it to thee if it were silver; I would give it even if it were gold." - the Edda

3653048988.name: Mark of the Duskborn
3653048988.description: "We called her Verok; it was her and her Thrall that finally overwhelmed him." - Eris

3653048989.name: Mark of the Hidden
3653048989.description: "And with the lone strength of the Titan Vell Tarlowe, we felt invincible." - Eris

3653819064.name: Aspriet 1.0
3653819064.description: Crucible variant. Combines flexible fieldwire with tough fullerene plates.

3653819065.name: Aspriet 1.1
3653819065.description: Crucible variant. Combines flexible fieldwire with tough fullerene plates.

3654591822.name: Tireless Striders
3654591822.description: If there is no road, then it cannot be long.

3654604872.name: Sunscorched Lens
3654604872.description: "We have mastered the art of shaping and tempering physical Light."

3654604873.name: Wings of Apris-Fol
3654604873.description: "To you goes the glory and the honor of battle." —Fractal Scrolls

3654604875.name: Echo of Honor
3654604875.description: "For he was once of your City, and honored there." —Fractal Scrolls

3657704990.name: Astrolord Helm
3657704990.description: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

3657704991.name: Helm of No Tomorrow
3657704991.description: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

3660153609.name: Kellbreaker's Gloves
3660153609.description: The gas is no soul. An ethereal lifeblood, maybe, but a soul? I think not.

3661659402.name: Kellhunter's Blood
3661659402.description: The Servitors work the engines. The Archon plots the course. But it is the Kell who stands at the helm.

3662528364.name: "Controversial Remains"
3662528364.description: Like all Guardians, Warlocks are vessels for the Traveler's Light. But that power must be mastered.

3662528367.name: "Paradox and Truth"
3662528367.description: "The Light remade us. Can I still claim to be human? Can you still say you were made by human hands?"

3664122880.name: Crystalline Rays
3664122880.description: "For the mystery of it, you see. If one of us froze and fell, the others wouldn't know. And to cheer the children." —Ikora Rey

3664806619.name: Spektar Infinite Hood
3664806619.description: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

3676927716.name: Sanction Six
3676927716.description: Field-tested tactical rig plated with the alloys of ancient combat aircraft.

3676927718.name: Dustwalker
3676927718.description: Shiftwire-lined and hardened shell armor designed for work in the Martian sands.

3676927719.name: Ghost Angel
3676927719.description: Triple-weaved rubber-plasm armor designed for silent motion.

3677095940.name: Snowglare Helm
3677095940.description: Lights in the distance through the swirling snow. Salvation or destruction?

3677095941.name: Helm of Lamentation
3677095941.description: Their wailing is the song of your triumph.

3677348580.name: Gwalior Type 3
3677348580.description: "Total militarization would drive us to extinction." - Consensus transcript

3677348581.name: Gwalior Type 2
3677348581.description: "Total militarization would drive us to extinction." - Consensus transcript

3677348582.name: Gwalior  Type 1
3677348582.description: "Total militarization would drive us to extinction." - Consensus transcript

3677348583.name: Gwalior Type 0
3677348583.description: "Total militarization would drive us to extinction." - Consensus transcript

3678707177.name: Skull Mask
3678707177.description:
Festival of the Lost 2015
You have risen from eternal night to haunt the dreams of your enemies. 

This mask can be discarded and reclaimed at the holiday kiosk.

3686632461.name: Days of Iron Crown
3686632461.description: "When the Last of Lords unfurled the Banner once again, who took up arms to march beneath it?" —The New-Forged Song

3689370929.name: Desolate Veil
3689370929.description: A smell of ozone. A distant scream. A feeling of dread.

3689370930.name: Keeper's Mind
3689370930.description: "Crows fly far. Bring us whispers of things to come." —Variks

3689370931.name: Spektar Hood
3689370931.description: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

3691021872.name: "Mystic Drain"
3691021872.description: At the desperate battle of Twilight Gap, Warlocks worked in concert to shatter the enemy. It was not quite enough.

3691021873.name: "Inertia Engine"
3691021873.description: "I believe that the Traveler and its Light are advanced technology. I refuse to accept that this diminishes me."

3691021880.name: "Expansion"
3691021880.description: Always consider the connection between your field work and vaster things.

3691021881.name: "Light Unknown"
3691021881.description: The bond is signified and signifier, source and focus. Do not seek closure. Let the mystery unfold you.

3691021882.name: "Variable Flow"
3691021882.description: "Your power flows through the bond. Remember what it represents."

3691021883.name: "Trained Chaos"
3691021883.description: "Control space and time. Mere matter and energy will follow."

3691021884.name: "Phantom Wisdom"
3691021884.description: "What is Light? Who made it? How does it work? Light itself answers these questions. Do you understand?"

3691021885.name: "Creation's Wind"
3691021885.description: "The Light releases us from causality. It smooths the contours of what we can and cannot do."

3691021886.name: "Cryptic and Ineffable"
3691021886.description: "You did not receive the bond so you could babble arcane words. Go forth, and burn our enemy."

3691021887.name: "Eye of History"
3691021887.description: Those orders most closely allied with the Titans seek to hone the battlefield deployment of Light.

3691267894.name: Fear Eater
3691267894.description: When I wear the mask I am a machine, the purpose of which is consumption.

3692454268.name: Spektar Legs
3692454268.description: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

3692454269.name: Keeper's Path
3692454269.description: "She saw much. Knew much. Now we learn without her guidance." —Variks

3707771005.name: Lightmail
3707771005.description: Fabricated by your Ghost with available mass, this basic armor is very thin on plating.

3709866616.name: "The Conflagration"
3709866616.description: Everything was born from an unimaginable fire. Here, I'll show you.

3709866617.name: "Metastability Event"
3709866617.description: The great energies of the Golden Age never triggered a false vacuum decay. We'll be fine.

3710968004.name: Elector's Heart
3710968004.description: They will know you fight not for yourself, but for the people's will.

3711300948.name: Monitor Type 2
3711300948.description: "The Cabal centurion opened up on her at point-blank, and we heard the most fearsome sound. She was laughing."

3722233944.name: Forester 2.1
3722233944.description: Sparrows burn. Ships crash. The wise Hunter knows machines will fail, and makes ready to walk.

3722233945.name: Forester 2.1r2
3722233945.description: Sparrows burn. Ships crash. The wise Hunter knows machines will fail, and makes ready to walk.

3722233946.name: Forester 2.1r3
3722233946.description: Sparrows burn. Ships crash. The wise Hunter knows machines will fail, and makes ready to walk.

3723059940.name: Heliopause Greaves
3723059940.description: We'll walk if we have to.

3723203568.name: Gatewatch
3723203568.description: Born in the dark age that followed the Collapse, this is a formidable defense for the novice Titan.

3723203569.name: Gatewatch Type 2
3723203569.description: Born in the dark age that followed the Collapse, this is a formidable defense for the novice Titan.

3724577046.name: Timur's Iron Bond
3724577046.description: "Only those forged in Light can stand against the lurking shadows."

3724577047.name: "The Risen Ones"
3724577047.description: What rules us is our service to the greater welfare of the City.

3724577048.name: "Circle of War"
3724577048.description: "Understanding is not an end, but a beginning from which new truths are born."

3724577049.name: Skorri's Iron Bond
3724577049.description: "Rise above, so that you may lift those below."

3724577050.name: "No Tomorrow"
3724577050.description: "For every dead yesterday there waits a new dawn, with no promise of tomorrow."

3724577051.name: "The Chaos Constant"
3724577051.description: "Darkness consumes, but, we shall mark the abyss with eternal fire."

3724577052.name: "Willful Exodus"
3724577052.description: "…'til even the stars heed our calling."

3724577053.name: "Light Beyond"
3724577053.description: "Every light that marks the abyss offers hope against the rising tide."

3724577054.name: "Mirrors of Chaos"
3724577054.description: If the City falls, there will be no one left to adjudicate phenomenological debates. So now, even the scholars fight.

3724577055.name: "Death of Fate"
3724577055.description: "Our fate is not sealed. With the proper will, and enough force, it can be rewritten."

3729730126.name: Thought Lantern
3729730126.description: We are here to cast a little light.

3729730127.name: Incandescent Mind
3729730127.description: A tiny engine, bright with thought...

3730263108.name: Watchers' Greaves
3730263108.description: A prestigious trophy earned in battle during the Trials of Osiris.

3730263109.name: Greaves of the Exile
3730263109.description: A prestigious trophy earned in battle during the Trials of Osiris.

3732631646.name: Wrap of the Fatekiller
3732631646.description: Humanity has been caged. We will break the bars.

3732631647.name: Robe of the Exodus
3732631647.description: Humanity has been caged. We will break the bars.

3734616175.name: Iron Camelot Helm
3734616175.description: Forged in remembrance of Silimar, he who was the Last City's first wall.

3738854615.name: AOS#Cryptid
3738854615.description: Crucible variant. The treads know how to grip more than forty thousand terrain types.

3740934760.name: "Cast in Blood"
3740934760.description: "The naysayers in Consensus don't understand that we LIKE to fight each other." - Ain Suhu-ässä

3740934761.name: NOYB Mark
3740934761.description: "One day in the Crucible tells you everything you need to know about a Guardian. Even yourself." - Thalor

3740934763.name: Mark of the Supreme
3740934763.description: Titan lore memorializes the greatest warriors of humanity's past.

3741354736.name: "The Transcendent Mind"
3741354736.description: "Other orders try to learn the laws of Light. We accept that Light transcends all law."

3741354737.name: "Cosmic Truths"
3741354737.description: "To bind Light into the same framework as the proton or the mere neutrino is an act of close-minded hubris."

3741354738.name: "Controversial Remains"
3741354738.description: Like all Guardians, Warlocks are vessels for the Traveler's Light. But that power must be mastered.

3741354740.name: "Computable Secrets"
3741354740.description: Exo Warlocks take particular interest in the physics of Light, seeing analogy to their own origins.

3741354741.name: "Paradox and Truth"
3741354741.description: "The Light remade us. Can I still claim to be human? Can you still say you were made by human hands?"

3741354742.name: "Ancestral Demise"
3741354742.description: Humanity's rich and tattered history provides fuel for libraries of debate on Light, the Traveler, and all creation.

3741354743.name: "The Waking Dreams"
3741354743.description: Awoken Warlocks ponder their own visions as whispers into the truths of Light and Dark.

3741354744.name: "One True Constant"
3741354744.description: Some orders eschew all metaphysics and ontological doctrine in favor of pure combat discipline.

3741354745.name: "Blood Maturity"
3741354745.description: "I have found that rarest treasure: a pragmatic Warlock." - Saint-14

3748657972.name: Samsara I
3748657972.description: "It is a lonely thing, to live forever." —Alemyr

3748657973.name: Apex Harmonic
3748657973.description: Will is an arsenal, knowledge an armament. Each thought, a submunition.

3748657974.name: Eclipse Maw VI
3748657974.description: Applied ontology is the art of convincing things they shouldn't exist.

3748657975.name: Nerigal Savant III
3748657975.description: Into the void, the spark. From the spark, the fire. After the fire, the void.

3750335743.name: Endling Vest
3750335743.description: We are the last of our species.

3750749513.name: Raku Gwener Type 1
3750749513.description: Crucible variant. Combining the best of Golden Age and City Age innovation.

3753761958.name: Immanent War Mark
3753761958.description: The subtlest of wars still leave their marks.

3755547917.name: Infinite Lines Robes
3755547917.description: "I saw myself! Slaying the Darkness! That's what I saw!" —RECORD 344-CHASM-6872

3758132320.name: "Song of the Light"
3758132320.description: At the edge of the singularity, light freezes, unable to face the mystery. But you must go on.

3758132321.name: "The Tethering"
3758132321.description: "The farther apart you pull two quarks, the harder they snap back."

3758132322.name: "Other Side of Nothing"
3758132322.description: "Nobody comes back the same."- The Parables of Osiris

3758132323.name: "Emerald Light"
3758132323.description: "They'll believe you are one of their own. And that is the only way." - Toland, the Shattered

3758132324.name: "Eternal Light"
3758132324.description: "You stand for something immutable and transcendent. Act like it." - reprimand to a younger Ikora Rey

3758132325.name: "Loop of Night"
3758132325.description: "I could flense you apart, molecule by squirming molecule. It is within my power." - Toland the Shattered

3758132326.name: "Twist of Fate"
3758132326.description: "There will come a time when you can no longer see objects - only clouds of probability and law."

3758132327.name: "Forgotten Force"
3758132327.description: Every exercise of your power adds a syllable to the greater song.

3758132332.name: "Song of Dusk"

4260440589.description: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

4263908104.name: Hadron Gale IV
4263908104.description: Do not judge a storm by its size.

4267429868.name: Jovian Guard
4267429868.description: Choose your words and sigils well, for they are your remembering.

4270124520.name: "The Risen Ones"
4270124520.description: What rules us is our service to the greater welfare of the City.

4270124521.name: "The Order"
4270124521.description: "A fractured will is the hallmark of disorder…"

4270124522.name: "The Age to Come"
4270124522.description: "There is strength in unity. And a King of many, will be the King of all."

4273141717.name: Heliopause Cloak
4273141717.description: "Once, deep space explorers were seen as heroes. Now, for suggesting humanity should look beyond this system, some call us cowards." —Arach Parnell

4273171880.name: Exodus Vest
4273171880.description: Under this armor, a heart yearns to wage celestial war.

4273171881.name: Sojourn Vest
4273171881.description: Humanity has been caged. We will break the bars.

4273171882.name: Heliopause Vest
4273171882.description: The Sun used to give us life. Now, staying near the Sun will be our doom.

4273171883.name: Dead Light Vest
4273171883.description: "Success is not about survival. It is about discovery." —Arach Modesta

4274025724.name: Mark of the Hidden
4274025724.description: "And with the lone strength of the Titan Vell Tarlowe, we felt invincible." - Eris

4274025725.name: Mark of the Spawn
4274025725.description: "It's not an Acolyte's loin cloth, it's the spoils of war." - Vell Tarlowe

4274025727.name: Mark of the Duskborn
4274025727.description: "We called her Verok; it was her and her Thrall that finally overwhelmed him." - Eris

4275796002.name: Kabr's Pocket Watch
4275796002.description: The tick-tock of this strange watch sometimes feels like a heartbeat.

4275796003.name: Horn of Six Wars
4275796003.description: How many have died with the blast of this horn ringing in their ears?

4275796004.name: Saint-14's Ring
4275796004.description: "Was there ever another Guardian so beloved by the people?" —Paean to Saint-14

4275796005.name: Asharru's Hope
4275796005.description: "I know not why we left the Reef, nor why we live so long, nor even why we are called Awoken. But I hope one day to have answers." —Asharru

4275796006.name: Radegast's Blade
4275796006.description: So long as this sword was whole, the Iron Banner could not be broken.

4275796007.name: Fortuna Pendant
4275796007.description: A necklace made out of the remains of the asteroid destroyed during the Reef Wars.

4278137385.name: Endling Greaves
4278137385.description: We are endangered, but we can save ourselves.

4279147592.name: Agema Type 0
4279147592.description: A derivative of the Gatewatch pattern, Agema armor incorporates the lessons of too many bloody stands.

4279147593.name: Agema  Type 1
4279147593.description: A derivative of the Gatewatch pattern, Agema armor incorporates the lessons of too many bloody stands.

4279284444.name: Argus Deimatic 1.3
4279284444.description: Patterned by a grizzled Hunter and a Praxic Warlock, this remarkable armor records everything for later analysis.

4279284445.name: Argus Deimatic 1.3r1
4279284445.description: Patterned by a grizzled Hunter and a Praxic Warlock, this remarkable armor records everything for later analysis.

4280308778.name: Infinite Lines Greaves
4280308778.description: "Every time I look, it's like—the Darkness just grows larger." —RECORD 345-CHASM-6736

4285258138.name: Pacorus Type 1
4285258138.description: "I promise, my son, I will avenge you."

4285258139.name: Pacorus Type 0
4285258139.description: "I promise, my son, I will avenge you."

4285258140.name: Garuda Type 1
4285258140.description: "You won't see us again. We'll forge a new path." —Lilavati-12

4285258141.name: Garuda Type 0
4285258141.description: "You won't see us again. We'll forge a new path." —Lilavati-12

4285258142.name: BRONTIOS Type 1
4285258142.description: This helmet's exterior speakers have adjustible volume. Your battle cries will break your enemy's eardrums.

4285258143.name: BRONTIOS Type 0
4285258143.description: This helmet's exterior speakers have adjustable volume. Your battle cries will break your enemy's eardrums.

4292535404.name: Exodus Greaves
4292535404.description: It will be cold and harrowing and we will not all survive. But it must be done.

4292535405.name: Oblivion Greaves
4292535405.description: It will be cold and harrowing and we will not all survive. But it must be done.

4294567508.name: Dead Light Helm
4294567508.description: "Listen. Some stars won't stop calling to us." —Arach Linde

19464.name: Thanatonaut's Bond
19464.description: There's always a gap in the memories.

19465.name: Bond of Veils
19465.description: A thousand Thanatonauts on a thousand journeys have made only the tiniest of tears in death's veil.

19466.name: Wellspring Bond
19466.description: A Guardian in the wilds is better than water in the desert.

19467.name: Seraph Bond
19467.description: "Some of the City folk call us angels. Others...take a different view."

19468.name: "Praxic Vim"
19468.description: Praxic Warlocks don't hate research. They just don't let it interfere with the fight.

19469.name: "Praxic Thunder"
19469.description: With knowledge, purpose. Each sharpens and hones the other.

632341.name: Raku Poltergeist 2.0
632341.description: Crucible variant. Padded with light and durable diamond foam.

1574664.name: Endling Mask
1574664.description: We will only be extinct when the last of us is gone.

3509787.name: Kellhunter's Hood
3509787.description: "Here's my plan to be Kell. Fallen seem to respect violence and big capes. I'm really violent, and I found this cape."

6252344.name: Manifold Seeker II
6252344.description: The clean geometry of the helmet reflects the clarity and decision of the mind within.

6252345.name: Manifold Seeker I
6252345.description: The clean geometry of the helmet reflects the clarity and decision of the mind within.

10673376.name: Winged Sun Gauntlets
10673376.description: "Those who fly beneath the Sun do not come back unscathed." —Parables of the Allspring

10673377.name: Blindsight Gauntlets
10673377.description: "With the sight I saw the self within the self." —Fractal Scrolls

11037811.name: Immanent War Greaves
11037811.description: Stride through chaos; leave ash in your wake.

13050290.name: Unity Clade
13050290.description: Every time you rise, the past walks with you.

13050291.name: Apex Harmonic
13050291.description: The field action of the weave synchronizes neuron populations to optimize muscle response.

13565936.name: Spektar's Mark
13565936.description: The heat shimmers off the shield, refracting into broken rainbows.

13565937.name: Mark of the Witness
13565937.description: "Fighting your enemy helps you understand your enemy. Don't get distracted." —Zavala

15845168.name: Chroma Vow
15845168.description: Warlocks are expected to maintain ceremonial robes. We cannot cede the sartorial struggle to the Hunters.

15845169.name: Chroma Vow III
15845169.description: Warlocks are expected to maintain ceremonial robes. We cannot cede the sartorial struggle to the Hunters.

16664392.name: Warden's Rally
16664392.description: "That Prison holds nothing that does not want to be there. Knowing that, ask yourself, 'Why do the Taken stay?'" —Eris Morn

16664393.name: Spektar Grasps
16664393.description: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

16664395.name: Desolate Grips
16664395.description: More than shadows, but less than starstuff.

18327078.name: Hesperonaut Mark
18327078.description: Our heritage is not one of war, but of exploration.

18327079.name: Pioneer Mark
18327079.description: These marks recall the flags that waved over the first Venus colonies.

18576972.name: Eclipse Maw VI
18576972.description: Applied ontology is the art of convincing things they shouldn't exist.

18576973.name: Nerigal Savant III
18576973.description: Into the void, the spark. From the spark, the fire. After the fire, the void.

23451592.name: Willbreaker's Resolve
23451592.description: Their blades break against your heart.

26270742.name: Endling Helm
26270742.description: We will only be extinct when the last of us is gone.

27771120.name: Wax-Sealed Case
27771120.description: Definitely not made of wax. Probably actually a case, though.

27771121.name: Thrice-Wrapped Thing
27771121.description: Sure, try and unwrap it. I mean, what could possibly go wrong?

27771122.name: Filament Hex
27771122.description: A Hive totem woven and bound from filaments of the universe itself.

27771123.name: Dredgen Yor's Rose
27771123.description: "In his strong hand the man held a Rose. And his aura burned bright."

27771124.name: Ankh of Sai Mota
27771124.description: //…a rattling shriek, the crunch of bones and the fading echoes of a brave woman's last laugh…//

27771125.name: Blood-Soaked Charm
27771125.description: To carry this charm is to fight for the lost world that fashioned it.

32904336.name: Raku Izumi IV
32904336.description: Crucible variant. Element shift allows for optimal sprinting, jumping, and holding position.

33631361.name: Spektar Grasps
33631361.description: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

35226794.name: KALI-GNT Scout Rig
35226794.description: I am a KALI-GNT SKULL MOUNT. Let us find prey.

35692241.name: Vitruvius Mark
35692241.description: "The great generals and tacticians of the past have much to teach us." —Commander Zavala

37876524.name: Mark of the Anchor
37876524.description: Titan orders are often accused of dour fatalism. But there are those who celebrate all they protect.

37876525.name: Mark of the Fortress
37876525.description: Fortresses do not wait silently for war. They are schools, trading posts, monuments. Vessels for life.

37876526.name: Mark of the Beacon
37876526.description: "A singer came to me, saying, 'You protect me, and I do nothing in return.' I told him to sing, and he understood." - Saint-14

38310100.name: Raku Vindicator
38310100.description: A notable triumph in the ongoing sartorial struggle.

38310101.name: KALI-GNT Scout Rig
38310101.description: I am a KALI-GNT CHARRINGTON TACTICAL TREAD. What's on your mind?

42867523.name: Iron Breed Sleeves
42867523.description: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

44227836.name: Days of Iron Gloves
44227836.description: "When the tainted grail o'erflowed again, who answered?" —The New-Forged Song

47507137.name: Deathsinger's Herald
47507137.description: "Frankly, it's surprising that these don't hover."

58287017.name: Spektar Kallipolis Gloves
58287017.description: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

60040896.name: Toutatis Type 0
60040896.description: "Your job on the fireteam is to stand when everything else seems sure to fall."

60040897.name: Toutatis Type 1
60040897.description: "Your job on the fireteam is to stand when everything else seems sure to fall."

60040898.name: Toutatis Type 2
60040898.description: "Your job on the fireteam is to stand when everything else seems sure to fall."

60040899.name: Toutatis Type 3
60040899.description: "Your job on the fireteam is to stand when everything else seems sure to fall."

60040900.name: Toutatis Type 4
60040900.description: "Your job on the fireteam is to stand when everything else seems sure to fall."

60040901.name: Toutatis Type 5
60040901.description: "Your job on the fireteam is to stand when everything else seems sure to fall."

60573262.name: Gloves of the Exile
60573262.description: A prestigious trophy earned in battle during the Trials of Osiris.

60573263.name: Watchers' Gloves
60573263.description: A prestigious trophy earned in battle during the Trials of Osiris.

72887664.name: Kabr's Wrath
72887664.description: In the aftermath, he became obsessed with the machines.

74042164.name: Code Fire I
74042164.description: The ceremonial hoods of the first Warlocks directed attention to their words rather than their identities.

74042165.name: Code Fire
74042165.description: The ceremonial hoods of the first Warlocks directed attention to their words rather than their identities.

74042166.name: Code Fire III
74042166.description: The ceremonial hoods of the first Warlocks directed attention to their words rather than their identities.

74042167.name: Code Fire II
74042167.description: The ceremonial hoods of the first Warlocks directed attention to their words rather than their identities.

78421062.name: Young Ahamkara's Spine
78421062.description: Give me your arm, oh bearer mine. Let me help you fill the world with teeth.

79021170.name: Sanction Six
79021170.description: Field-tested tactical rig plated with the alloys of ancient combat aircraft.

79021171.name: Fear Eater
79021171.description: "Are you afraid? Listen closely: so are they."

81603307.name: Knight Type 1
81603307.description: Every Guardian is a priceless resource. Titan armor is an incubator for legends.

82944038.name: Iron Companion Plate
82944038.description: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

93850354.name: Kallipolis Crown
93850354.description: Not the past, not the future. The present is where we should turn our eyes.

94503888.name: AOS#Al-Suhail I
94503888.description: Crucible variant. The fieldweave skull-wrap develops its own reflex pathways with use.

94503889.name: AOS#Al-Suhail II
94503889.description: Crucible variant. The fieldweave skull-wrap develops its own reflex pathways with use.

94503890.name: AOS#Al-Suhail III
94503890.description: Crucible variant. The fieldweave skull-wrap develops its own reflex pathways with use.

94503891.name: AOS#Al-Suhail IV
94503891.description: Crucible variant. The fieldweave skull-wrap develops its own reflex pathways with use.

94503892.name: AOS#Al-Suhail V
94503892.description: Crucible variant. The fieldweave skull-wrap develops its own reflex pathways with use.

94503893.name: AOS#Al-Suhail VI
94503893.description: Crucible variant. The fieldweave skull-wrap develops its own reflex pathways with use.

94883184.name: ATS/8 ARACHNID
94883184.description: Advanced tactical sensorium. Induced hallucinations integrate broad-spectrum targeting data.

96763138.name: AOS#Cryptid Cloak
96763138.description: "Out there? All that is a job. Here, in the Crucible - this is a life."

96763139.name: H_LD Starwinder Cloak
96763139.description: As the cloak frays, it reveals the ancient works of Li Qingzhao, carved in chips of bone.

98823765.name: Spektar Infinite Greaves
98823765.description: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

99926223.name: "House of Kings"
99926223.description: "Have they not learned the fate of Earth's kings?"

105485105.name: ATS/8 Tarantella
105485105.description: Piezoweave induces controlled muscle spasms to improve combat performance.

105903490.name: Eclipse Maw VI
105903490.description: "When he came back his gloves were still smoking. Of the Fallen, nothing remained."

105903491.name: Nerigal Savant III
105903491.description: Stop thinking of the world as an outcome. Start thinking of it as a process.

106004904.name: Samsara I
106004904.description: "Perhaps I had lives even before that. Perhaps I was once a tree." —Wen Jie

106004905.name: Bindcaster I
106004905.description: "To inflict your desires upon reality." —Toland, the Shattered

111260720.name: 0A0X Nightmask v1.1.5
111260720.description: Crucible variant. Kinematics profiled for rapid flat-to-flight movement.

111260722.name: 0A0X Nightmask
111260722.description: Crucible variant. Kinematics profiled for rapid flat-to-flight movement.

111260723.name: 0A0X Nightmask v1.1.4
111260723.description: Crucible variant. Kinematics profiled for rapid flat-to-flight movement.

112663360.name: Ghost Angel
112663360.description: "Shake it off. We've all been dead before."

112663361.name: Dustwalker
112663361.description: Titan and a Hunter crash on Mars. Titan's helmet stops a Cabal slug. Hunter's helmet stops her from starving. Who lives?

112663363.name: Stratus White
112663363.description: Some generous Hunter donated this helmet for the use of newly reborn Hunters.

114347508.name: Locus Watcher IV
114347508.description: The rich fabric conceals Jormungand-coil fieldweave, capable of dangerous power spikes.

114347509.name: Locus Watcher III
114347509.description: The rich fabric conceals Jormungand-coil fieldweave, capable of dangerous power spikes.

114347510.name: Locus Watcher II
114347510.description: The rich fabric conceals Jormungand-coil fieldweave, capable of dangerous power spikes.

114347511.name: Locus Watcher I
114347511.description: The rich fabric conceals Jormungand-coil fieldweave, capable of dangerous power spikes.

117392809.name: Colovance's Choice
117392809.description: "I will fight to stop the fighting. If that means I must die, then I choose death." —Lord Colovance

117392810.name: Perfected SIVA Capsule
117392810.description: "SIVA destroyed the Iron Lords, but history need not repeat itself. Use it if you must. Even the most destructive tool, in the end, is a tool." —Tyra Karn

117392811.name: SIVA Capsule
117392811.description: This bundle of SIVA rests safely in a containment capsule. For now.

124062044.name: Heart of the Order
124062044.description: Under this armor, a heart yearns to wage celestial war.

124062045.name: Heart of the Justicar
124062045.description: The City is divided. We must unite beneath a single will.

124062046.name: Kallipolis Vest
124062046.description: The City's ruler must be a warrior as well as a philosopher.

124062047.name: Elector's Heart
124062047.description: They will know you fight not for yourself, but for the people's will.

124508677.name: Prime Zealot Helm
124508677.description: Forged from the cores of Hezen Vex. If you feel a sense of revelation, remove immediately and inject antientheogens.

128807491.name: Zhurong Type 0
128807491.description: For whom do you fight? Do you even know their names?

128807492.name: Ithacan Type 1
128807492.description: Why do they always assume Titans aren't clever?

128807493.name: Ithacan Type 0
128807493.description: Why do they always assume Titans aren't clever?

128807494.name: Taroudant Type 1
128807494.description: For a Titan, determination is the highest of virtues.

128807495.name: Taroudant Type 0
128807495.description: For a Titan, determination is the highest of virtues.

130349300.name: Lost Prince Mask
130349300.description:
"Gone, but not forgotten." —Petra Venj

This mask can be discarded and reclaimed at the holiday kiosk.

130578780.name: War Numen's Mark
130578780.description: Will you barter your soul in exchange for the chance to kill a king?

130578781.name: Mark of the Old Challenge
130578781.description: By their rules must you win, or not at all.

133528858.name: Mark of Chaos
133528858.description: There is no doubt that our future will be won in battle.

133528859.name: Mark of No Tomorrow
133528859.description: Passion and patience in equal measure will open the unlimited way.

136219292.name: Relentless Harness
136219292.description: The splayed claws and empty skull of a Thrall cry defiance to the Hive.

137348250.name: Raku Poltergeist 2.0
137348250.description: Crucible variant. Now less likely to decouple neural connections.

141200149.name: Spektar Heliopause Hood
141200149.description: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

142001566.name: Spektar Heliopause Cloak
142001566.description: If only Darkness lies beyond the heliopause, we have already lost.

142571568.name: Hesperos Type 0
142571568.description: At the dawn of the Golden Age, the Hesperonauts were the first to descend into Venus's boiling mists.

142571569.name: Hesperos Type 1
142571569.description: At the dawn of the Golden Age, the Hesperonauts were the first to descend into Venus's boiling mists.

144386080.name: KD Bogatyr 2.0
144386080.description: "I'm depending on you, Guardian. Wouldn't want me to get bored, would you?" —Cayde-6

144553853.name: Mask of the Third Man
144553853.description: "It wasn't me. It was the Third Man."

144553854.name: Achlyophage Symbiote
144553854.description: "They told me it would eat my thoughts and leave me full of Light."

144553855.name: Knucklehead Radar
144553855.description: You can see the point, right? Who wants to team up with one?

148636324.name: Cloak of the Justicars
148636324.description: In pursuit of the City's safety, our jurisdiction is unlimited.

148636325.name: Cloak of Order
148636325.description: The City prospers on our field of order and justice.

149041867.name: Iron Saga Grips
149041867.description: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

149060560.name: Anathema Cannon Mark
149060560.description: "The Devils have gone too far this time." —Lord Saladin

155374077.name: Immolation Fists
155374077.description: "Don't let this sacrifice be in vain."

155972844.name: Red Miasma Bond
155972844.description: Just give it a directive, and it won't stop until it gets a new directive. ~SIVA.MEM.WB008

155972845.name: Spliced Red Miasma Bond
155972845.description: Just give it a directive, and it won't stop until it gets a new directive. ~SIVA.MEM.WB008

156707608.name: The Ishtar Dilemma
156707608.description: Never did answer Sundaresh's question, now did we?

156707609.name: Ones and Zeroes
156707609.description: Maybe that's all we really are.

156707611.name: Squid Pro Quo
156707611.description: "Yes, my love for cephalopods is well documented." —Pahanin Errata

156707612.name: Harbinger Hood
156707612.description: A pattern inspired by the legendary Awoken weapon.

156707613.name: Queen's Arrow
156707613.description: City artists created this pattern to honor the Queen of the Awoken.

158587848.name: Taroudant Type 0
158587848.description: "Wherever you go, your footprints mark the City's outermost walls."

158587849.name: Taroudant Type 1
158587849.description: "Wherever you go, your footprints mark the City's outermost walls."

158587850.name: Ithacan Type 0
158587850.description: "We leave the City to ensure there will still be a City when we return."

158587851.name: Ithacan Type 1
158587851.description: "We leave the City to ensure there will still be a City when we return."

158587852.name: Zhurong Type 0
158587852.description: "To those behind the Wall, love and service. To those outside it, fury and fire." —Pilgrim Guard maxim

162157029.name: Cloak of the Rising
162157029.description: The New Monarchy is the aegis that guards humanity.

162157030.name: Cloak of Order
162157030.description: The City prospers on our field of order and justice.

162157031.name: Cloak of the Justicars
162157031.description: In pursuit of the City's safety, our jurisdiction is unlimited.

177212690.name: Traveler Mask
177212690.description:
"Such simplicity. Such contours! Been inside the Traveler, you know. Smells faintly of vanilla." —Fenchurch Everis

This mask can be discarded and reclaimed at the holiday kiosk.

178015297.name: Endling Bond
178015297.description: "I am haunted by the Endling, the last living human." —Arach Jalaal

179288772.name: Lightmail
179288772.description: Fabricated by your Ghost with available mass, this basic armor is very thin on plating.

180906762.name: Iron Companion Mask
180906762.description: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

180906763.name: Iron Camelot Casque
180906763.description: Forged in remembrance of Efrideet, she whose keen eye never missed her mark.

181849966.name: Iron Camelot Gauntlets
181849966.description: Forged in remembrance of Jolder, she whose mighty hammer taught the Darkness fear.

181849967.name: Iron Companion Gauntlets
181849967.description: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

186143053.name: Tireless Striders
186143053.description: If there is no road, then it cannot be long.

186520644.name: Dead Light Grips
186520644.description: "At least we'll know we tried." —Arach Henri

186571090.name: Iron Camelot Grips
186571090.description: Forged in remembrance of Perun, she who hunted the Darkness where it dwelt.

186571091.name: Iron Companion Sleeves
186571091.description: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

189873545.name: Jolder's Iron Sash
189873545.description: You are an army, an armada, a force unto itself.

190411895.name: Scarab's Vigil Gauntlets
190411895.description: "Step forward, if you think you can challenge me." —Fractal Scrolls

190446371.name: Crystalline Rays
190446371.description: "For the mystery of it, you see. If one of us froze and fell, the others wouldn't know. And to cheer the children." —Ikora Rey

191736999.name: Harrowed Darkhollow Mask
191736999.description: "The Dreadnaught is a blighted hollow gouged into our universe." —Eris Morn

194003932.name: Grips of No Tomorrow
194003932.description: Accept war as a fundamental process, not a transient condition.

194003933.name: Astrolord Grips
194003933.description: Accept war as a fundamental process, not a transient condition.

198836010.name: Immanent War Gloves
198836010.description: Tomorrow will not be easily tamed.

201220485.name: Iron Saga Vest
201220485.description: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

201740456.name: "Atlas's Burden"
201740456.description: "Other ages had the phalanx, the carrier, the KKV. Now you are the defining weapons system of our time."

201740457.name: "The Mandate"
201740457.description: "We reject this cumbersome doctrine of interdependence. Every solitary Titan must be a standfast against the dark."

203169782.name: "Blood and Mortar"
203169782.description: "A distraction? The Crucible challenges our best. It is the finest training the City could ask."

203169783.name: "Ultimateless"
203169783.description: Those who bear this mark vow to always test the limits of Light against the Light itself.

205776168.name: Scalpel Wing IV
