1937895861.description: "Those who find victory in the Crucible will win salvation for our City." - Iron Banner maxim

1937895862.name: Cloak of Dredgen Yor
1937895862.description: Before he took Pahanin's Light, Dredgen Yor ruled the Crucible, the notorious Thorn at his side.

1937895863.name: Cloak of Hidden Agendas
1937895863.description: "Tell a Titan only a madman would go. Tell a Warlock it's too complex." - Pahanin Errata

1937895864.name: Cloak of the Shadowjacks
1937895864.description: Twilight Gap highlighted the desperate need for proactive strikes to keep the enemy off balance.

1937895865.name: Cloak of the Shadowsmiths
1937895865.description: "It's already being handled." - Cayde-6, in an emergency session of the City Consensus

1939620532.name: Snakeline 4.5
1939620532.description: "The black gloves are tough, menacing and—I swear—make you unbeatable at Go." —Pahanin Errata

1939620533.name: Snakeline 4.5b
1939620533.description: "The black gloves are tough, menacing and—I swear—make you unbeatable at Go." —Pahanin Errata

1939620534.name: Snakeline 4.5d
1939620534.description: "The black gloves are tough, menacing and—I swear—make you unbeatable at Go." —Pahanin Errata

1939620535.name: Snakeline 4.5.2
1939620535.description: "The black gloves are tough, menacing and—I swear—make you unbeatable at Go." —Pahanin Errata

1941735260.name: Fatekiller Hood
1941735260.description: The enemy stands between us and our salvation. Open the way.

1941735261.name: Hood of the Exodus
1941735261.description: The enemy stands between us and our salvation. Open the way.

1943318156.name: Exultation Vest
1943318156.description: Carry the ones who fell close to your heart.

1944434610.name: Speeder Boots
1944434610.description:
In the end, there was nothing left but a smoking pair of boots.

This item can be discarded and reclaimed at the holiday kiosk.

1944434611.name: Speeder Boots
1944434611.description:
In the end, there was nothing left but a smoking pair of boots.

This item can be discarded and reclaimed at the holiday kiosk.

1951141466.name: Illyrian Type 0
1951141466.description: Not so much a formal Firebreak variant as the collected wisdom of Titans interested in peak performance.

1951141467.name: Illyrian  Type 1
1951141467.description: Not so much a formal Firebreak variant as the collected wisdom of Titans interested in peak performance.

1954673440.name: Dustwalker Cloak
1954673440.description: A good survival cape can be used as a hull patch, bandage, tourniquet, pressure seal, picnic blanket...

1954673441.name: Octopus Cloak
1954673441.description: "If human extinction seems imminent, try to relax. You're just giving cephalopods a shot." - Pahanin Errata

1954673442.name: Cloak of the Mantis
1954673442.description: "Patient camouflage and precise violence. No wonder they survived."

1954673443.name: Cloak of the Leopard
1954673443.description: Legend says that no animal was more difficult to hunt than the leopard.

1954673444.name: Hood of the Spawn
1954673444.description: "Toland cracked the rune, or led us to believe he did. I told him it was either that, or the Hive have a hell of a recipe for beer." - Omar Agah

1954673445.name: H_LD Starwinder Cloak
1954673445.description: As the cloak frays, it reveals the ancient works of Li Qingzhao, carved in chips of bone.

1954673446.name: AOS#Cryptid Cloak
1954673446.description: "Out there? All that is a job. Here, in the Crucible - this is a life."

1954673447.name: Ghost Angel Cloak
1954673447.description: We are an army of the chosen dead.

1954673450.name: Cloak of the Dusktorn
1954673450.description: "I'll remember the Light. Will it remember me?" - Sai Mota

1954673451.name: Cloak of the Hidden
1954673451.description: "The shadows dance quickly among the dust. Make them your ally." - Eris

1955511930.name: "Other Side of Nothing"
1955511930.description: "Nobody comes back the same."- The Parables of Osiris

1955511931.name: "The Tethering"
1955511931.description: "The farther apart you pull two quarks, the harder they snap back."

1960785498.name: Exile Shell
1960785498.description: For Ghosts who follow the burning path of Osiris.

1963125496.name: Cobra's Vigil Robes
1963125496.description: "If you wish to learn the ways of war, look around you." —Parables of the Allspring

1971098534.name: Sojourn Grips
1971098534.description: We must make our own safety without the City.

1971098535.name: Exodus Grips
1971098535.description: We must make our own safety without the City.

1971267776.name: Objekt 959 Guards
1971267776.description: Exposed heat sinks dump vaporized coolant.

1971267777.name: Molniya Custom T1
1971267777.description: Mighty field drivers put armor-shattering force into every punch.

1971451024.name: Mantle of Perun
1971451024.description: Your mark be made, by thunder's crack or lightning's strike.

1971451025.name: Cloak of Repair
1971451025.description: We'll carve our future through the will of the people.

1971451026.name: Dead Light Cloak
1971451026.description: "Beyond the Reef. Beyond the Nine." —Arach Jalaal

1971451027.name: Cloak of Immanent War
1971451027.description: A new dawn breaks. Feel how it burns.

1971451029.name: All My Victims Cloak
1971451029.description: Made from the torn cloaks of other Hunters. Other, lesser Hunters.

1971451031.name: Lead Scout's Cloak
1971451031.description: "To clear mines: step on mine. Wait for Ghost revival. Step on mine 2. Wait for Ghost. Step on - "

1971451038.name: Cloak of the Exile
1971451038.description: "Was he exiled? Did he leave willingly? Was the parting angry? Peaceful? Is he dead? Alive? In a word: yes." —Sister Faora

1973841835.name: Harrowed War Numen's Crown
1973841835.description: Show them you can contain multitudes, and your interiority will spawn nightmares.

1974787801.name: Raven Sheath II
1974787801.description: You are one of the only living beings with the freedom to roam at will. Stop a while and watch the stars.

1974787802.name: Raven Sheath I
1974787802.description: You are one of the only living beings with the freedom to roam at will. Stop a while and watch the stars.

1974787803.name: Raven Sheath
1974787803.description: You are one of the only living beings with the freedom to roam at will. Stop a while and watch the stars.

1979402994.name: Harrowed War Numen's Fist
1979402994.description: The start is always the same. Enter his court, and call him out.

1981740512.name: Mark of the Embattled
1981740512.description: Marks are worn low on the body to avoid interfering with a Titan's arms or weapons. They still see wear.

1981740513.name: Mark of Discipline
1981740513.description: Novice Titans are expected to adapt to their new lives with discipline and determination.

1981740514.name: Mark of the Risen
1981740514.description: A Titan's mark declares deeds and influences. Your Ghost scrounged this cloth together. It's a start.

1981740515.name: Mark of History
1981740515.description: Titan marks are worn to honor the history of individuals or entire orders.

1981740516.name: Mark of the Wall
1981740516.description: "We have one city. One final chance. There are no forgivable errors. Be ceaseless in your vigilance."

1981740517.name: Mark of Renown
1981740517.description: Robust and flexible, the iconic Fieldplate pattern has served every Titan order.

1981740518.name: Bastion Mark
1981740518.description: Field repairs are part of the Titan creed, but the particularly devoted clip spare tools to their mark.

1981740519.name: Mark of Sacrifice
1981740519.description: Sometimes the mark will tangle in the armor. Shred it without hesitation. It, too, is prepared to sacrifice.

1981740522.name: Mark of Diligence
1981740522.description: Titan armor is crafted by legion members, not the City's foundries. Every would-be smith proves themselves on Fieldplate.

1981740523.name: Mark of Fortitude
1981740523.description: Some historians mark the rise of Fieldplate as the moment the Titan orders found their footing.

1984812258.name: Iron Breed Boots
1984812258.description: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

1988228616.name: Wolves' Cloak
1988228616.description: "Run with me, we've new trails to stalk."

1988228617.name: Devils' Cloak
1988228617.description: "There are some bargains worthy of any risk."

1988228620.name: Melting Point
1988228620.description: In the Crucible, you'll find yours.

1988228621.name: Competitor Match
1988228621.description: "Instinct tells you to cherish victory, but defeat holds all the lessons." —Lord Shaxx

1995654494.name: Exodus Cover
1995654494.description: Travel the wilderness and master it. This is our salvation.

1995654495.name: Sojourn Cover
1995654495.description: Travel the wilderness and master it. This is our salvation.

1998474274.name: Spektar Aspriet Boots
1998474274.description: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

1998946585.name: Scarab's Vigil Greaves
1998946585.description: "The challenge will come when you least expect it. You must be ready." —Fractal Scrolls

2001487260.name: Lightmail
2001487260.description: Fabricated by your Ghost with available mass, this basic armor is very thin on plating.

2001658176.name: Spektar Aspriet Vest
2001658176.description: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

2006777123.name: Spektar Infinite Gauntlets
2006777123.description: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

2007792164.name: Iron Saga Helm
2007792164.description: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

2011165716.name: Cloak of Atropos
2011165716.description: One boast goes, "When Cabal see my cloak, they flee." Another goes, 'Look at all these dead Cabal!'

2011165717.name: Cloak of Tekmor
2011165717.description: When an old Hunter wears a simple cloak, ask yourself where she got it, and what the cloth remembers.

2011165718.name: Nagari Cloak
2011165718.description: In this age of Light and fire, simple skills still endure. Hunters embroider signs of war and loss on their cloaks.

2011530290.name: Cosmoclast Greaves
2011530290.description: Willa, some of history's greatest inventions began as unintended side effects. ~SIVA.MEM.CL015

2011530291.name: Spliced Cosmoclast Greaves
2011530291.description: Willa, some of history's greatest inventions began as unintended side effects. ~SIVA.MEM.CL015

2012012865.name: Pleiades Hood
2012012865.description: The enemy sees beyond visual light, so cloth camouflage is difficult. No sense looking drab.

2012012866.name: Fieldcraft Hood
2012012866.description: Even vacuum-ready field wire armor should be kept out of the rain. Rig a hood.

2012012867.name: Not A Fallen Hood
2012012867.description: Friendly fire is as deadly as any Fallen skiff, so some Hunters choose cloaks for pure visibility.

2014802937.name: Binary Lazarus
2014802937.description: Encrypted by the First Children at the Precipice of Flame, before the Exile.

2014802938.name: Harlequin Pendulum
2014802938.description: A curious device, sought after by the Gensym Scribes.

2014802939.name: White Polygon Construct
2014802939.description: A strange holographic bond. The information within describes something vast.

2014802940.name: Union of the Consensus
2014802940.description: A symbol of union worn by chosen Warlocks in the great Consensus.

2014802941.name: Spirit of the Vulture
2014802941.description: Before grace, subsistence. Before nobility, survival.

2014802942.name: Ulan-Tan's Burial Ring
2014802942.description: A replica of the legendary burial ring of Ulan-Tan.

2014802943.name: The Five Lives of Albios
2014802943.description: Woven to honor the last stand of Albios.

2016050971.name: Immanent War Vest
2016050971.description: Conflict is the mother of reality.

2016842206.name: Azoth Bend I
2016842206.description: Warlocks trace their cultural roots back to the alchemists of the ancient world.

2016842207.name: Azoth Bend II
2016842207.description: Warlocks trace their cultural roots back to the alchemists of the ancient world.

2019341558.name: Iron Camelot Gauntlets
2019341558.description: Forged in remembrance of Jolder, she whose mighty hammer taught the Darkness fear.

2020019240.name: Gauntlets of the Seven
2020019240.description: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

2020019241.name: Iron Regalia Gauntlets
2020019241.description: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

2021783910.name: Cloak of the Skypillar
2021783910.description: Some suggest Saint-14's legendary vigil was enabled by a few roaming Hunters and their bloody culls.

2021783911.name: Hustler's Cloak
2021783911.description: They say you will never find an impractical Hunter. But what do 'they' know about dashing cloaks?

2021783912.name: Hardcase Cloak
2021783912.description: If you learn nothing else, learn this: when a Hunter takes up the cloak of a dead comrade, this is a vow.

2021783913.name: Grinder's Cloak
2021783913.description: "First, check your cloak for damage. Second, inspect yourself for major wounds." - Handbook of (Un)Controversial Advice

2021783914.name: Frumious Cloak
2021783914.description: Tell the Warlocks your cloak is frabjous. They respect words they don't understand.

2021783915.name: Cloak of Perception
2021783915.description: "Have you walked the ruins? Seen the machines born from the lightning? We face a mighty foe."

2021783916.name: Brawler's Cloak
2021783916.description: Hunters may be averse to centralized organization, but nothing is more fearsome than a coordinated stalk.

2021783917.name: Cloak of Reverence
2021783917.description: The stylized twin arc represents the world beneath the Traveler.

2021783918.name: Cloak of Ragged Fortune
2021783918.description: Sometimes a Hunter will lose a cloak in a bet. It's poor form to replace it right away.

2021783919.name: Maverick's Cloak
2021783919.description: "Bright colors are Mother Nature's way of saying 'don't mess with me.' We like a lot of her ideas."

2026036808.name: Efrideet's Eye
2026036808.description: Every time she pulled the trigger, an enemy of the City died.

2026036809.name: Pallas Ring
2026036809.description: The Queen of the Reef commissioned these rings for each of the survivors of the Siege of Pallas.

2026036813.name: Trinary Star
2026036813.description: "We were fools to trust this god-machine, this bringer of death and Darkness."

2026036814.name: Ahamkara Scale
2026036814.description: "And that Warlock thought I couldn't do it. Hah!"

2026036815.name: The Maraid
2026036815.description: The chronicle of Queen Mara Sov of the Awoken, compiled by the Primarchs of the Reef Cryptarchy.

2026992061.name: Hadron Gale Bond
2026992061.description: "I will put an ocean into a thimble. I will build a world on the edge of a blade."

2027496356.name: Sinaa Jaguar 2.1
2027496356.description: If the enemy flees, run them down. If the enemy strikes back, reposition. Speed is always the answer.

2027496357.name: Sinaa Jaguar 2.1r2
2027496357.description: If the enemy flees, run them down. If the enemy strikes back, reposition. Speed is always the answer.

2027496358.name: Sinaa Jaguar 2.1r3
2027496358.description: If the enemy flees, run them down. If the enemy strikes back, reposition. Speed is always the answer.

2028036494.name: Path of Xol
2028036494.description: Bound together, their power knows no limit, save their thirst for more.

2028036495.name: Harrowed Path of Xol
2028036495.description: Bound together, their power knows no limit, save their thirst for more.

2038561472.name: Cloak of the Cosmonaut
2038561472.description: Vladimir Komarov helped build and fly Earth's first ships. He gave his life to the frontier.

2038561473.name: Cloak of the Apsides
2038561473.description: "The Hunter creed calls us outward. And what do we find out there? Hard vacuum. Respect it."

2038561474.name: Bloodstained Hood
2038561474.description: "Those Jaguar militant types seem a little extreme." —a person of inadequate ferocity

2038561475.name: Hood of the Night Sun
2038561475.description: "I am not a dashing rogue. I am not a free spirit. I am a claw in the throat of the dark, and I will draw blood."

2038561476.name: Extropic Cloak
2038561476.description: "Child came for our robes today. He said the Awoken Hunters needed them, as they were cold." —Warlock doorlog

2038561477.name: Cloak of the Reefrunners
2038561477.description: "The child asked me if the Awoken were blue because they were cold. Then he called my cloak a blanket."

2038561478.name: Cloak of the Unflinching
2038561478.description: Anyone who takes the pathway into orbit will never want to leave it. Challenge the universe.

2038561479.name: Cloak of the Unborn
2038561479.description: "Child asked me if I was a clock. I told her yes. I was keeping time until the world would be safe for her."

2038561482.name: Cloak of Atropos
2038561482.description: One boast goes, "When Cabal see my cloak, they flee." Another goes, 'Look at all these dead Cabal!'

2038561483.name: Cloak of Tekmor
2038561483.description: When an old Hunter wears a simple cloak, ask yourself where she got it, and what the cloth remembers.

2038632594.name: Fist of Eight Moons
2038632594.description: Only in the Ascendant Plane—where a well-defended idea is a reality—do these moons, in this small way, still exist.

2038632600.name: Oraclery
2038632600.description: A moving mechanical model whose parts blink in and out of existence.

2038632601.name: Oversoul's Scream
2038632601.description: If you hold it to your ear and listen closely, you'll go deaf.

2038632602.name: Oraclery
2038632602.description: A moving mechanical model whose parts blink in and out of existence.

2038632603.name: Oraclery
2038632603.description: A moving mechanical model whose parts blink in and out of existence.

2038632604.name: Jasper Carcanet
2038632604.description: I WAS MIDHA, CONSORT OF STARS. I WILL NOT BE FORGOTTEN.

2038632605.name: Thrallskin Drum
2038632605.description: A drum made from the skin of a Hive Thrall. Even when no one is playing it, you can always hear a faint beat.

2038632606.name: Oversoul's Scream
2038632606.description: If you hold it to your ear and listen closely, you'll go deaf.

2038632607.name: Oversoul's Scream
2038632607.description: If you hold it to your ear and listen closely, you'll go deaf.

2041380554.name: Robe of the Exodus
2041380554.description: Humanity has been caged. We will break the bars.

2041380555.name: Wrap of the Fatekiller
2041380555.description: Humanity has been caged. We will break the bars.

2049313364.name: Pennant Cloak
2049313364.description: Guardians often band together and form close-knit teams to achieve victory in the Crucible.

2050430656.name: Gatewatch Type 1
2050430656.description: An armored helmet protects against fragmentation and gunshot, galvanized by the Titan's own Light.

2050430657.name: Gatewatch
2050430657.description: An armored helmet protects against fragmentation and gunshot, galvanized by the Titan's own Light.

2050430658.name: Gatewatch Type 3
2050430658.description: An armored helmet protects against fragmentation and gunshot, galvanized by the Titan's own Light.

2050430659.name: Gatewatch Type 2
2050430659.description: An armored helmet protects against fragmentation and gunshot, galvanized by the Titan's own Light.

2055339184.name: Astrolord Cloak
2055339184.description: History's lords have ever painted the future in tones of fire and shadow.

2055339185.name: Cloak of No Tomorrow
2055339185.description: Tomorrow will be as yesterday was. There will always be a battle to be won.

2055339186.name: Mantle of Gheleon
2055339186.description: You are an army, an armada, a force unto itself.

2055339187.name: Chaos Cloak
2055339187.description: There is no doubt that our future will be won in battle.

2055339189.name: Nagari Cloak
2055339189.description: In this age of Light and fire, simple skills still endure. Hunters embroider signs of war and loss on their cloaks.

2055339190.name: Cloak of Oblivion
2055339190.description: Our salvation lies ahead of us. Go forth. There is nothing left to leave behind.

2055339196.name: Cloak of the Justicars
2055339196.description: In pursuit of the City's safety, our jurisdiction is unlimited.

2055339197.name: Mantle of Efrideet
2055339197.description: Stand in the fire until there is nothing left to burn away.

2059410341.name: Lightmail
2059410341.description: Fabricated by your Ghost with available mass, this basic armor is very thin on plating.

2060120800.name: Raku Crucible Type
2060120800.description: Crucible custom. Plate lining provides constant transcranial magnetic stimulation to enhance alertness.

2060120801.name: DURGA-GNT Type 0
2060120801.description: I am a DURGA-GNT SKULL BUCKET. Please bucket your skull before entering combat.

2060360887.name: Kallipolis Bond
2060360887.description: The leader we need is among us, not above us.

2063415782.name: Haliaetus II
2063415782.description: Crucible variant. Chiral fieldweave allows for unique programming on each leg.

2063415783.name: Haliaetus I
2063415783.description: Crucible variant. Chiral fieldweave allows for unique programming on each leg.

2064330998.name: Watchers' Grips
2064330998.description: A prestigious trophy earned in battle during the Trials of Osiris.

2064330999.name: Grips of the Exile
2064330999.description: A prestigious trophy earned in battle during the Trials of Osiris.

2072689472.name: Circuit Gauntlets
2072689472.description:
Worn by champions of the track.

This item can be discarded and reclaimed at the holiday kiosk.

2073560916.name: Iron Camelot Grips
2073560916.description: Forged in remembrance of Perun, she who hunted the Darkness where it dwelt.

2074277047.name: Heliopause Gloves
2074277047.description: "We are not fatalists. We're optimists. We believe life exists beyond this dead orbit." —Arach Linde

2075993080.name: 0A0X Nightmask
2075993080.description: Crucible variant. Cut down and regraphed for agility.

2075993081.name: 0A0X Nightmask 1.1
2075993081.description: Crucible variant. Cut down and regraphed for agility.

2075993082.name: 0A0X Nightmask 1.2

2075993083.name: 0A0X Nightmask 1.3r1
2075993083.description: Crucible variant. Cut down and regraphed for agility.

2075993084.name: 0A0X Nightmask 1.3r2
2075993084.description: Crucible variant. Cut down and regraphed for agility.

2075993085.name: 0A0X Nightmask 1.4
2075993085.description: Crucible variant. Cut down and regraphed for agility.

2077001472.name: Sanction Six
2077001472.description: Some Hunters boast of things they find. We boast of places we fly.

2077001473.name: Bog Wild 1.0
2077001473.description: Try not to get bogged down with the little things.

2077001474.name: Dustwalker
2077001474.description: Shiftwire can induce nerve activity. It makes mere skin feel like dead plastic.

2077001475.name: Ghost Angel
2077001475.description: "As we climbed the tern cliffs he moved their nests aside, real gently. At the top he strangled the Fallen sentry. Same hands."

2099086864.name: Heliopause Grips
2099086864.description: "We are not fatalists. We're optimists. We believe life exists beyond this dead orbit." —Arach Linde

2099650277.name: Spektar Haliaetus Legs
2099650277.description: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

2109934830.name: Lightmail
2109934830.description: Fabricated by your Ghost with available mass, this basic armor is very thin on plating.

2110735268.name: Mark of the Sentry
2110735268.description: The City's enemies often use airmobile tactics. Some Titans train for rapid response to these landings.

2110735269.name: Mark of the Protector
2110735269.description: The first Titans led survivors to the safety of the City.

2110735271.name: Mark of the First Pillar
2110735271.description: Titans train to fight on dangerous ground, a first line of defense against any crisis.

2112419343.name: Legendary Engram Mask
2112419343.description:
"Yes, it's true—the Legendary Engram was named after me." —Fenchurch Everis

This mask can be discarded and reclaimed at the holiday kiosk.

2113871045.name: Holocide Helm
2113871045.description: A prestigious trophy earned in battle during the Trials of Osiris.

2113871046.name: Watchers' Hood
2113871046.description: A prestigious trophy earned in battle during the Trials of Osiris.

2113871047.name: Hood of the Exile
2113871047.description: A prestigious trophy earned in battle during the Trials of Osiris.

2117166702.name: Dead Light Greaves
2117166702.description: "When all is shadow, know your journey has begun." —Arach Parnell

2122538504.name: "The Age to Come"
2122538504.description: "There is strength in unity. And a King of many, will be the King of all."

2122538505.name: "Circle of War"
2122538505.description: "Understanding is not an end, but a beginning from which new truths are born."

2122538506.name: "Light Beyond"
2122538506.description: "Every light that marks the abyss offers hope against the rising tide."

2122538507.name: Stormcaller Bond
2122538507.description: You are the calm eye of the dire storm.

2123192368.name: Infinite Lines Boots
2123192368.description: "Every time I look, the Darkness just grows larger." —RECORD 345-CHASM-6736

2125621864.name: Claw of Command
2125621864.description: On the might of your hand does your authority depend.

2125621866.name: Sootpearl
2125621866.description: These oddly beautiful orbs can sometimes be found sunk into the rot and filth of the Dreadnaught.

2125621867.name: Scroll of Eimin-Tin
2125621867.description: You hold in your hands the last record of a long-dead civilization.

2129462487.name: Mantle of Sublime Light
2129462487.description: A trial by fire, the purpose of which is transformation.

2136544541.name: Cryptarch Mask
2136544541.description:
"I myself frequently don the guise of my old friend Rahool in order to enter the Tower unremarked." —Fenchurch Everis

This mask can be discarded and reclaimed at the holiday kiosk.

2137413904.name: Gwalior  Type 1
2137413904.description: The Gwalior pattern improves on standard Fieldplate while remaining economical.

2137413905.name: Gwalior Type 0
